attributes.additional_details: All key workers who put their and their families in risk to support the country and their communities so the UK can run and keep feeding the people must have some type of financial support alot of people have  no money left because of so many payments during this pandamic those key workers should have council tax, utility bills knocked off or some type of financial help like other buisness are getting. This is a shame every buisness and people who never worked in their entire life are enjoying
attributes.background: COVID 19 has left  huge impact on normal people's lifestyle especially Key worker's  every buisness claiming money for nothing and goverment is just spending money on them blindly by not knowing the fact how many other people have left behind with no aid and support by the goverment.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172
